snippet: A coming exhibition at the Morgan Library & Museum focuses on drawings by Matthew Barney; public art exhibitions resume at Rockefeller Center with a series of figures by Ugo Rondinone.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; coming exhibition at the Morgan Library & Museum focuses on drawings by Matthew Barney; public art exhibitions resume at Rockefeller Center with a series of figures by Ugo Rondinone; installation of work by Conceptual artist Adam Pendleton goes on view at Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum.
lead_paragraph: A coming exhibition at the Morgan Library & Museum focuses on drawings by Matthew Barney; public art exhibitions resume at Rockefeller Center with a series of figures by Ugo Rondinone.

headline.seo: Matthew Barney Drawings at the Morgan
headline.main: Matthew Barney Heads to the Morgan Library
headline.print_headline: Matthew Barney Heads to the Morgan Library
